column1: in memory of carlene jane (pribbernow) allen| first: last: born: may 13
column3: 2015. this memorial provided by:cline hanson. new london
column8: went to her heavenly home on friday
column13: daughter of the late carl and margaret (arndt) pribbernow. carlene was a lifelong resident of new london. she was a member of emanuel lutheran church in new london. carlene spent her life caring for others. she is survived by her children: peter (elizabeth) allen
column18: gabe and sammy allen; sisters: orian (daryl) fonstad
column21: waupaca. she is further survived by nieces
column24: other relatives and friends. she was preceded in death by her parents and her brother in-law
column25: don holloway. the christian funeral for carlene will be held on tuesday
column27: 2015 at 11:00 a. m. at emanuel ev. lutheran church in new london with rev. marcus schulz officiating. burial will be in floral hill cemetery
column28: new london. a visitation for carlene will be held on monday
column30: 2015 from 4:30-7:00 p. m. at the cline & hanson funeral home in new london and also at the church on tuesday from 10:00 a. m. until the time of the service.
